name: Debate!
description:
"DEBATE" is a 2-player fast-pace action game, where players read books to convert information to energy.

Player should read books as fast as they can by pressing the "A" Button on their controller repeatedly.

Faster reader will gain energy(HP) at a higher speed, the one who gains more energy will win the game!

NOW SMASH THE CONTROLLERS!!!

REMEMBER TO PLAY SAFE, WE WILL NOT COVER YOUR CONTROLLER REPAIRING EXPENSES.
